birth_place.en: Lunbei Village, Torao District, Tainan Prefecture

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省台北市古亭区马场町
death_place.en: Machangding, Guting District, Taipei City, Taiwan Province, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 台湾教师、社会活动家，云林仑背人。曾任猫儿干国民学校校长，并在南投竹山国民学校、台北龙山国民学校、云林莿桐国民学校任教。因在台湾白色恐怖时期参与中国共产党台湾省工作委员会的地下活动，于1951年被国民党政府逮捕，1952年被枪决。2018年促进转型正义委员会撤销其有罪判决。
description.en: A Taiwanese teacher and social activist from Lunbei, Yunlin. He served as the principal of Ma'o-kan Elementary School and also taught at Zhushan Elementary School in Nantou, Longshan Elementary School in Taipei, and Citong Elementary School in Yunlin. During the White Terror period in Taiwan, he was arrested by the Kuomintang government in 1951 for his involvement in the underground activities of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China, and was executed by firing squad in 1952. In 2018, the Transitional Justice Commission posthumously exonerated him by revoking his conviction.

description.zh-cn: 郭庆的妻子，同在猫儿干国民学校担任教职。
description.en: Guo Qing's wife, who also worked as a teacher at Ma'o-kan Elementary School.

description.zh-cn: 郭庆的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Guo Qing.

description.zh-cn: 郭庆的儿子。
description.en: Son of Guo Qing.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台南市的国立大学，郭庆曾在此就读。
description.en: A national university located in Tainan, Taiwan, where Guo Qing studied.

description.zh-cn: 台湾一所已于二二八事件后停办的学院，郭庆曾在此夜间部进修。
description.en: A college in Taiwan that ceased operations after the February 28 incident, where Guo Qing attended night classes.

nodes.id: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会
中共台湾省工作委员会
en: Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在台湾的地下组织，于1950年代被国民党政府破获。
description.en: An underground organization of the Communist Party of China in Taiwan, which was dismantled by the Kuomintang government in the 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 二仑乡公所总干事，中共地下党员，介绍郭庆加入组织。
description.en: Chief executive of Erlun Township Office, an underground member of the Communist Party of China, who introduced Guo Qing to the organization.

description.zh-cn: 中共地下党员，与郭庆在同一小组。被捕后供出组织关系，导致郭庆等人被捕。
description.en: An underground member of the Communist Party of China, in the same cell as Guo Qing. After his arrest, he confessed to the organization's connections, leading to the arrest of Guo Qing and others.

description.zh-cn: 1945年后统治台湾的政权。
description.en: The regime that ruled Taiwan after 1945.

description.zh-cn: 指中国国民党在台湾于1949年至1991年间的政治高压时期。
description.en: Refers to the period of political repression in Taiwan under the Kuomintang from 1949 to 1991.

zh-cn: 中华民国促进转型正义委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府为处理威权统治时期不法行为而设立的独立机关。
description.en: An independent government agency of the Republic of China established to address injustices committed during the period of authoritarian rule.

zh-cn: 云林县仑背乡丰荣国小

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾云林县仑背乡的小学，郭庆曾于1949年起担任该校校长。
description.en: An elementary school in Lunbei Township, Yunlin County, Taiwan, where Guo Qing served as principal from 1949.

description.zh-cn: 位于台北市的墓地，埋葬了许多台湾白色恐怖时期的政治受难者，郭庆的墓地在此被发现。
description.en: A cemetery in Taipei where many political victims of the White Terror period were buried; Guo Qing's grave was discovered here.

description.zh-cn: 1949年中华民国政府在台湾实施的土地改革政策。
description.en: A land reform policy implemented by the government of the Republic of China in Taiwan in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 中共台湾省工作委员会领导人之一。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中共台湾省工作委员会领导人之一。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 郭庆所属的中共地下组织由张志忠等人领导。
description.en: The CCP underground organization Guo Qing belonged to was led by Zhang Zhizhong and others.

description.zh-cn: 郭庆所属的中共地下组织由李妈兜等人领导。
description.en: The CCP underground organization Guo Qing belonged to was led by Li Madou and others.

description.zh-cn: 经钟心宽介绍，郭庆参加了中国共产党的地下组织。
description.en: Through Zhong Xinkuan's introduction, Guo Qing joined the underground organization of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 廖学信被捕后，供出了组织关系，导致郭庆于1951年5月20日被捕。
description.en: After Liao Xuexin's arrest, he confessed to the organization's connections, which led to Guo Qing's arrest on May 20, 1951.

description.zh-cn: 两人在中共地下党组织中被分到同一小组。
description.en: The two were assigned to the same cell in the CCP's underground organization.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府以“意图颠覆政府”为由将郭庆逮捕并处决。
description.en: The government of the Republic of China arrested and executed Guo Qing on charges of "intending to subvert the government".

description.zh-cn: 郭庆是台湾白色恐怖时期的政治受难者之一，在此期间被政府处决。
description.en: Guo Qing was one of the political victims of the White Terror period in Taiwan and was executed by the government during this time.

description.zh-cn: 于2018年12月7日正式公告撤销郭庆的有罪判决，为其平反。
description.en: On December 7, 2018, it officially announced the revocation of Guo Qing's guilty verdict, posthumously rehabilitating him.

description.zh-cn: 郭庆被枪决后，被埋葬于台北六张犁，其墓碑后于此地被发现。
description.en: After his execution, Guo Qing was buried at Liuzhangli in Taipei, where his tombstone was later discovered.

description.zh-cn: 郭庆利用国民党政府的三七五减租政策，推动业佃谈判，以发展共产党组织。
description.en: Guo Qing used the Kuomintang government's 375 Rent Reduction policy to promote negotiations between landlords and tenants in order to expand the Communist Party organization.
